collection.sentence:
This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and share
information about you when you use our services.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: User-Provided Information: We collect your email address when you sign up for our services.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: API Data: When you use our APIs (e.g., calendar, contacts, tasks), we may collect data you provide through these APIs.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: Our APIs also collect anonymous feedback for improvement purposes.
